episodes_names: Episode 1 - A Lavish Banquet of Raining Coins!

Episode 6 - Alleys, Cellars, and a Lavish Banquet!
Episode 7 - There's a Lot to Life, and a Lavish Banquet!
Episode 8 - What a Terrible Face, and a Lavish Banquet!
Episode 9 - Bang Bang Ba-Bang, It's a Lavish Banquet!
Episode 10 - Show Your True Intentions with a Lavish Banquet!
Episode 11 - A Showdown You Won't Believe, and a Lavish Banquet!
Episode 12 - In Full Bloom! A Lavish Banquet of Smiles!
